Cirion and Eorl and the Friendship of Gondor and Rohan

wikitext.*:
'''''Rochon Methestel''''' was the name of a song that was made about [[Borondir|Borondir Udalraph]], who was sent out to seek the aid of the [[Éothéod]] by his Steward [[Cirion]]. He came back with the troops of [[Eorl]], but did not survive the [[Battle of the Field of Celebrant]].<ref name=Rochon>{{UT|8e}}, p. 313, note 27</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Rochon Methestel'' is [[Sindarin]] for "Rider of the Last Hope",<ref name=Rochon/> from the elements ''[[rochben]]'' ("rider") + ''[[meth]]'' ("last") + ''[[estel]]'' ("hope, trust").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-518949235.html|articlename=S. ''Rochon Methestel'' pn.|website=[[Eldamo]]|accessed=17 August 2022}}</ref>
